properties.entry: SELECT T.TYPE_NAME, C.COMM_NO, C.COMM_TITLE, U.USER_NAME, C.CREATE_DT, C.COMM_VIEWS FROM COMM C JOIN USER_INFO U USING(USER_NO) JOIN COMM_TYPE T ON TYPE_NO = COMM_TYPE WHERE COMM_TYPE = ? ORDER BY COMM_NO DESC
SELECT C.COMM_CONTENT, C.COMM_TITLE, U.USER_NAME, C.CREATE_DT, C.COMM_VIEWS, TYPE_NAME FROM COMM C JOIN USER_INFO U USING(USER_NO) JOIN COMM_TYPE T ON TYPE_NO = COMM_TYPE WHERE COMM_NO = ?
